name: v1.1.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Added **CAA** query support by @LuitelSamikshya in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/172
* Added **AXFR** zone transfer detection support by @Mzack9999 in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/173
* Added CDN detection support by @LuitelSamikshya in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/207
* Added self-diagnostic functionality by @Mzack9999 in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/217
* Added using `dnsx` as a lib documentation by @Kadrick in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/229
* Fixed bug with large wordlist input by @Mzack9999 in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/185
* Fixed bug reading host config option by @Mzack9999 in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/185
* Fixed bug with static compilation for osx by @Mzack9999 in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/194
* Fixed bug with output option by @Mzack9999 in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/202

## New Contributors
* @byt3bl33d3r made their first contribution in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/188
* @forgedhallpass made their first contribution in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/187
* @Kadrick made their first contribution in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/229

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/compare/v1.1.0...v1.1.1

name: v1.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Added stream mode input support by @Mzack9999 in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/165
* Fixed an issue with hmap with auto-cleanup of temporary files  by @Mzack9999 in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/165


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/compare/v1.0.9...v1.1.0

name: v1.0.9
body:
## What's Changed
* Fixed invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference crash by @Mzack9999 in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/160

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/compare/v1.0.8...v1.0.9

name: v1.0.8
body:
## What's Changed
* Added **DNS Bruteforce** support by @M09Ic in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/130
* Added stdin support for `domain`, `wordlist` flag by @Mzack9999 in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/141
* Added support for TCP fallback on UDP truncation by @Mzack9999 in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/129
* Added Internal IP info export to json output by @Ice3man543 in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/143

Issues closed in this release: https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/milestone/3?closed=1

## New Contributors
* @parthmalhotra made their first contribution in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/125
* @M09Ic made their first contribution in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/130
* @parrasajad made their first contribution in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/142
* @Ice3man543 made their first contribution in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/143

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/compare/v1.0.7...v1.0.8

name: v1.0.7
body:
## What's Changed
* Added **TCP/UDP/DOH** resolver input support by @Mzack9999 in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/102
* Added **goflags** support by @LuitelSamikshya in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/116
* Added **hosts** file read support by @Mzack9999 in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/108
* Added functional tests by @LuitelSamikshya in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/120
* Performance **improvement** with subdomain wildcard filtering by @yabeow in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/106

## New Contributors
* @yabeow made their first contribution in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/106
* @LuitelSamikshya made their first contribution in https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/pull/116

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/compare/v1.0.6...v1.0.7

name: v1.0.6
body:
## Changelog

17d5b75 Added support for EDNS records #92 
efc879f Added scan pause/resume support #85 #91 
b44c885 Fixed a bug with `rcode` flag #86

name: v1.0.5
body:
# Changelog

- Added DNS [status code](https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/wiki/RCODE-ID-VALUE-Mapping) probing (`-rcode`) https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/issues/67
- Added timestamp info into JSON output https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/issues/71
- Added CIDR Input support https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/issues/69
- Fixed a crash upon multiple resolver input https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/issues/70
- Fixed golint and workflow improvements https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/issues/72

name: v1.0.4
body:
## Changelog

7ad0011 Fixed A bug with wildcard filtering https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/issues/10
29386dc Added DNS Trace support with `trace` flag. https://github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/issues/62

name: v1.0.3
body:
## Changelog


433624f Fixed a bug to query SOA record.
e40abc0 Fixed a crash in case of no results.

name: v1.0.2
body:
## Changelog

ebd2a77 Updated JSON output to make `raw` data optional.
8da10f8 Updated default concurrent rate to 100 (previously it was 250)
d8d9143 Updated to latest [retryabledns](https://github.com/projectdiscovery/retryabledns) with bugfixes
3b6827b Fixed a bug to display all output in lowercase.
d8644f4 Reduced docker image size from 364MB to 13.9MB by @jsav0

name: v1.0.1
body:
## Changelog

99a4a31 Added `stats` flag to display scan information in every 5 seconds. 
cf9498d Added stats support to windows and made it optional. 
99a4a31 Fixed a bug with terminal becomes unresponsive.
